cv:
Lanie Bergstrom Mumbai, Maharashtra - Email me on Indeed: Sarah.Berge@gmail.com

WORK EXPERIENCE
Associate Consultant
Oracle Financial Services - Bengaluru, Karnataka -
September 2017 to Present
• Currently associated as Associate Consultant with Oracle Financial Services Software. • Trained on Java, Plsql, Flexcube for 3 months from Oracle University.
Project Name KeyBank Project Team OBP team Project Duration 2 months Project Description • KeyBank, the primary subsidiary of KeyCorp is the major bank based in Cleveland. It uses Oracle Banking Platform to provide Online and Mobile Innovation to Meet Customers' Changing Expectations. • OBP team provides Web services, Business processes, domain services functionality to KeyBank.
Project Role and Contribution • Worked on migration of OBP product services from 2.3 to 2.6.1 using Java, Plsql, SOAP UI technologies. • Handled and worked on batch uploads. • Worked on Code incremental and DB incremental activities. • Configured Junit setup for the upgrade activities. • Unit Tested and modified the changes required for OBP consulting upgrade. • Worked on fixing various defects that were part of OBP product code and database upgrade. • Worked on Fund transfer module of OBP.
